meanings.definition: Prepubescents: children who have not yet reached puberty.
meanings.sent1: The playground was filled with prepubescents playing tag and giggling.
meanings.sent2: Parents often worry about the changes that come with prepubescents entering adolescence.
meanings.sent3: The prepubescents decided to have a race to see who could eat their ice cream the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her classroom was a garden of prepubescents, each flower waiting to bloom into adulthood.
meanings.sent5: The innocence of prepubescents is like a precious gem, untouched by the passage of time.
